WorkflowInfo.Name: Monitor servers availability
WorkflowInfo.Description: Checking the connectivity of list of servers/routers
WorkflowInfo.Xoml:
<SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:ReadXLS;Assembly=ReadXLS, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:GetRowsCount;Assembly=GetRowsCount, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:ExitWhile;Assembly=ExitWhile, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:GetCellValue;Assembly=GetCellValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:Ping;Assembly=Ping, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns5="clr-namespace:ReturnValue;Assembly=ReturnValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns6="clr-namespace:Continue;Assembly=Continue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns7="clr-namespace:SendEmail;Assembly=SendEmail, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"> <ns0:ReadXLS IsValid="True" x:Name="readXLS1" HostName="LocalHost" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="Read Excel" Path="c:\ServersList.xls" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Read excel file" HostId="1" TypeName="ReadXLS" UserName="" /> <ns1:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="getRowsCount1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ResultSet="%readXLS1%" DisplayName="Get Rows Count" ResultSetName="readXLS1" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." TypeName="GetRowsCount" /> <WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity1" Condition="{x:Null}"> <SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity1"> <ns2:ExitWhile IsValid="True" x:Name="exitWhile1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Counter="%getRowsCount1%" Description="Exit current while activity" DisplayName="Exit While" TypeName="ExitWhile" /> <ns3:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="ServerName" ColumnNumber="1" ResultSet="%readXLS1%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="readXLS1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /> <ns4:Ping IsValid="True" x:Name="ping1" TimeInSeconds="60" Timeout="00:01:00" HostName="%ServerName%" DisplayName="Ping" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Run a Ping command line" HostId="-2" TypeName="Ping" /> <IfElseActivity x:Name="Check_Status"> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="Server_UP"> <ns5:ReturnValue Value="Success" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,Success)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns6:Continue DisplayName="Continue" x:Name="continue1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" IsValid="True" TypeName="Continue" Description="Continue the current workfow or branch" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="Server_Down"> <ns5:ReturnValue Value="Failure" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,Failure)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns7:SendEmail Channel="Email" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="%ServerName% is down!" DestinationNumber="1" x:Name="sendEmail1" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:00:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="" Description="Send an email to a user, a group or a duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="0" Body="<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">
<HTML><HEAD>
<META content="text/html; charset=windows-1252" http-equiv=Content-Type>
<META name=GENERATOR content="MSHTML 11.00.9600.16476"></HEAD>
<BODY><PRE><PRE><FONT face=Arial>%ServerName% is down!<BR>Please check.</FONT></PRE></PRE></BODY></HTML>
" To="Admin" ShiftLevelCc="" MessageType="Custom" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> </IfElseActivity> </SequenceActivity> </WhileActivity> </SequentialWorkflowActivity>
WorkflowInfo.Details: This process retrieves a list of servers from an Excel file or a memory table and checks if the server is up or down. In case the server is down, an email is sent to the focal point. You can also add a ?focal point? column for each server and use this process to quickly and easily notify the relevant person whenever a server is down.
